text:
This gene provides instructions for making a protein that is involved in the development and maintenance of bone and brain tissue. Mutations in this gene cause the FGFR3 protein to be overly active, which leads to the severe problems with bone growth that are seen in thanatophoric dysplasia. It is not known how FGFR3 mutations cause the brain and skin abnormalities associated with this disorder.",GARD,Thanatophoric dysplasia
Is Thanatophoric dysplasia inherited ?,"Is thanatophoric dysplasia inh
